nodes.label: let weapon = & mut ctx . accounts . weapon_pda ;

loop { enhancement_level += 1 ; let clock = clock :: Clock :: get () ? ; let pseudo_random = (clock . unix_timestamp as u32) . wrapping_add (weapon . damage) % 100 ; if pseudo_random > 50 { weapon . damage += 5 ; msg ! ("Enhancement success! Attempt {}. New damage: {}" , enhancement_level , weapon . damage) ; } if pseudo_random <= 50 { msg ! ("Enhancement failed. Attempt {}." , enhancement_level) ; } if enhancement_level >= max_attempts { msg ! ("Reached max enhancement attempts.") ; break ; } }
